#multiple sets of inputs
n = int(input("Enter the number of input sets: "))
t = int(input("Enter the hour (0 to 24) to calculate temperature for all sets: "))

print("\nResults:")
print("Set\t a\t b\t c\t Temperature (°C)")
print("-" * 50)
for i in range(1, n + 1):
    print(f"\nEnter coefficients for Set {i}:")
    a = float(input("  Enter a: "))
    b = float(input("  Enter b: "))
    c = float(input("  Enter c: "))
    temp = a * (t ** 2) + b * t + c
    print(f"{i}\t {a:.2f}\t {b:.2f}\t {c:.2f}\t {temp:.2f}")
